des: "This is the way that we have made mayonnaise for years and years in my family, before commercial mayonnaise was sold at so cheap prices. It's always delicious!"
ins: Combine the egg, garlic, lemon juice and mustard in the container of a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth, then blend on low speed while pouring oil into the blender in a fine stream as the mixture emulsifies and thickens.
